name: Cyber City Driver Retro Arcade
description:
Are you ready to take on cyber city?


The Year is 2077, Drive your supercar through the futuristic city and conquer the road! Inspired by the arcade games of the 80's, but set in a futuristic neon city, all in silky-smooth retina graphics. Cyber City Drive brings addictive endless gameplay to have hours of fun just like the 80’s.

Take on the wheels, put your dodging skills to test and push the limits of your reaction time to avoid obstacles & dead ends. Collect objects and fuel to keep driving ahead!

Game Features:
- Hundreds of obstacles, and infinite challenge
- Breathtaking, beautiful and silky-smooth graphics
- Addictive gameplay!
- Smooth Controls

Enjoy the amazing gameplay and give us your feedback to help improve the game in future releases.
